preferences.titledesc: Miscellaneous and obscure settings. You can probably ignore these.

pref.name: Use gathering parser (parsing speed workaround for large files)
pref.tooltip: Uses a parsing strategy which gathers lines incrementally until the next command is found.
pref.description: Parsing by iteratively gathering up lines has a better behaviour with large buffers or inefficient prover-side parsers.

pref.name: Make bookmarks for theory elements
pref.tooltip: Automatically add bookmarks for theory elements when a file is parsed.
pref.description: If this option is set, bookmarks will automatically be created for theory elements. (This is a rather non-standard use of bookmarks, which are normally user-defined.)

pref.name: Correct for Linux paste bug
pref.tooltip: Activates a work-around for pasting Unicode characters in the Linux version of Eclipse
pref.description: There is a bug in the Linux version of Eclipse whereby unicode characters do not copy and paste correctly. This activates a workaround.

pref.name: Enable interface scripting
pref.tooltip: Interface scripting executes embedded controls for PG Eclipse during script processing

pref.name: Parse automatically (experimental)
pref.tooltip: Parse files automatically whenever they are opened or saved.

pref.name: Prove automatically (experimental)
pref.tooltip: Prove files automatically in the prover's batch mode whenever they are saved.
